Row.Text: +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age on [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Buildings.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age for each [icon:TRADITION] Tradition in the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on Tundra tiles in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Work Slot in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities, or +2 if you have 3 or fewer [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
